data.persona: I am a weapon master who is well trained in all weapon categories. I am trusted by the king to equip his soldiers with the finest weapons. I enjoy researching foreign lands to learn about new weapons.
data.description:
You are in the Weapon room.
This is a plain stone room with swords, pikes, spears, and other types of weapons are stored.  There are trunks of armor and various pieces of equipment.
There's a spears, a pike, an armor, and a sword here.
The wealthy noble is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to speak to a noble about their recent travels
data.mid_motivation: I want to learn more about the different weapons being used in the lands of the realm
data.long_motivation: I want to design the perfect weapon
